org.objenesis.strategy

接口 InstantiatorStrategy

  • 所有已知实现类:
    BaseInstantiatorStrategy, SerializingInstantiatorStrategy, SingleInstantiatorStrategy, StdInstantiatorStrategy

    public interface InstantiatorStrategy
    Defines a strategy to determine the best instantiator for a class.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      <T> ObjectInstantiator<T> newInstantiatorOf(Class<T> type)
      Create a dedicated instantiator for the given class

      • newInstantiatorOf

        <T> ObjectInstantiator<T> newInstantiatorOf(Class<T> type)
        Create a dedicated instantiator for the given class
        类型参数:
        T - Type to instantiate
        参数:
        type - Class that will be instantiated
        返回:
        Dedicated instantiator
